configmanager.name: Config Manager
configmanager.description: Allows you to edit and view values of all configuration values.
configmanager.install_files: __init__.py, html/jman.html, package.xml, js/common.js, js/jman.js, css/style.css, images/mtfile.png, images/mtfolder.png
configmanager.update_files: __init__.py, html/jman.html, html/jmanlite.html, package.xml, js/common.js, js/jman.js, js/jmanlite.js, css/style.css, images/mtfile.png, images/mtfolder.png
